name: Hide Away (五一进行曲)
lyrics:
作曲 : Lunak
Hey，
Where do the good boys go to hide away,
好男孩都去哪里了
hide away?
躲哪里去了
I'm a good,
我很好
Looking high and low,
满世界寻找
someone let me know，
谁来告诉我
Where do the good boys go to hide away, hide away?
好男孩都去哪里了
Talking them up about the things they do so well，
聊聊他们擅长的事
Where do the good boys go to hide away,
好男孩都去哪里了
hide away?
躲哪里去了
Where do the good boys go to hide away,
好男孩都去哪里了
收起
